label: uncl4507
comment: Code specifying the type of response to a request for credit cover.

values.label: Preliminary assessment
values.comment: A preliminary assessment without formal approval or commitment.

values.label: Approved
values.comment: The limit request has been approved.

values.label: Not approved
values.comment: The limit request has not been approved.

values.label: Conditional approval
values.comment: Approval subject to conditions as specified.

values.label: Still investigating
values.comment: The limit request is still under investigation.

values.label: Open new account only
values.comment: Buyer account has been opened without an approved limit.

values.label: Cancellation
values.comment: The existing limit has been cancelled.

values.label: Change of name and/or address
values.comment: The name and/or address of the buyer has changed.

values.label: Close buyer's account
values.comment: The buyer's account is to be closed.
